mapper.select: select d.`id`, d.`title`, d.`content`, d.`link`, d.`material_cover_id`, (select m.pic_url from material m where d.material_cover_id=m.id) as coverPicUrl, d.`summary`, d.`material_id`, d.`wechat_id`, d.status, d.sequence, d.remark, d.material_category_id, d.wx_image_text_id, d.tag_id, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.`name`) from member_tag t where FIND_IN_SET(t.id, d.tag_id)) as tagName, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created_at) as created_at, d.laste_updated_by, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(laste_updated_at) as lasteUpdatedAt, d.send_times, d.read_times, d.qrcode_id from dcrm_image_text_detail d where id = #{id}
